title: Having yasuo unbanned is actually a nightmare in all elos
body:
because they never just play normal they are the deciding factor of every game they're in and yasuo is picked realistically probably 80% of the time he's not banned, and is banned 50-75% of all games

yet they still do nothing, it's like Lee Sin season 4 all over again

replies.body:
Picked. Banned. Hard feed. Or hard carry. 

There's never a middle ground with Yasuo. His design is horrid but he sells so many skins he's never getting nerfed.

> [{quoted}](name=1Garen4Idiots,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ApTEofvg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-01T09:31:30.323+0000)

> 
> There's never a middle ground with Yasuo. His design is horrid but he sells so many skins he's never getting nerfed.

"hes never getting nerfed"
-Picked = he needs a nerf
-Banned = he needs a nerf
-Hard feed = he needs a nerf
-Hard carry = he needs a nerf

So to you no matter how strong yasuo is he needs a nerf. Whether hes carrying or feeding.

So your arguing basis is on the opinion of others in the game and not on the champion himself??? How is this logical?

kayle:  nerfed to oblivion due to an ultimate deemed unfair

poppy:  nerfed to oblivion due to an ultimate deemed unfair

yorick:  nerfed to oblivion because he had too much potential power in his kit

mordekaiser:  nerfed to oblivion for doing what they redesigned him for:  destroying the bottom lane meta

vayne:  formerly made the worst marksman in the game because any time she is meta, she becomes the BEST marksman

{{champion:28}} : nerfed to oblivion because she had a PERMANENT advantage over her opponents and people hated her for years

{{champion:27}} :  nerfed repeatedly just by other champs getting stronger even though he is league's NUMBER ONE RULE:  DON'T CHASE THE SINGED

When champions have an unfair advantage, they tend to get NERFED TO OBLIVION or REWORKED.  That player was trying to show how warped the game is by his presence.  Yasuo could win a team-fight by accident by releasing his windwall at the right time, that's how much influence he has as a champion

If his windwall was changed to be an offensive ability instead of a defensive one, most of his issues would disappear, but he is a crazy champion

He has not one, not two, not three but FOUR DEFENSIVE MEANS IN ONE KIT, while being a hyper-carry, highly mobile, able to cancel almost every ranged attack in the game for a few seconds, having the earliest late game power-spike in the game, being a tank-buster, having point and click crowd control that can affect multiple people, decent or greater wave-clear, a very flexible build path, has synergy with any champion possessing a knockup or displacement, low cooldown abilities, HIGHER RANGE THAN TYPICAL MELEES, 

and did I miss something...I probably did but I lost track

they've gutted his stats from their release values and he's still a major threat in the game...that says something
You forgot he has no mana/energy costs

Sigh.. lets get this over with for the 90th time...

"That player was trying to show how warped the game is by his presence"
by giving the opinion of other players in the game???

" Yasuo could win a team-fight by accident by releasing his windwall at the right time, that's how much influence he has as a champion"
Lux could win a team-fight by accident by releasing her laser at the right time, that's how much influence she has as a champion
Orianna could win a team-fight by accident by releasing her shockwave at the right time, that's how much influence she has as a champion
Kennen could win a team-fight by accident by releasing his ult at the right time, that's how much influence he has as a champion
Brand could win a team-fight by accident by releasing his ult at the right time, that's how much influence he has as a champion
Morg could win a team-fight by accident by releasing her ultat the right time, that's how much influence she has as a champion
Veigar could win a team-fight by accident by releasing his stun at the right time, that's how much influence he has as a champion
Leona could win a team-fight by accident by releasing her ult at the right time, that's how much influence her has as a champion
Hopefully you get the point to that argument.

"If his windwall was changed to be an offensive ability instead of a defensive one, most of his issues would disappear, but he is a crazy champion"
So you can just poke him out of lane constantly and make him a melee marksman? Explain to me how a melee marksman would be good? Considering ranged marksman complain they die everytime someone gets on top of them, I wonder how a melee marksman would do if he has to let them get on top of him to do dmg? Nice fix.

"He has not one, not two, not three but FOUR DEFENSIVE MEANS IN ONE KIT"
I dont want to assume to this so if you wanna clear up what these defensive means are because i know his shield and his wall.

"able to cancel almost every ranged attack in the game for a few seconds"
just every 20 seconds no such thing as actually baiting it out and playing around your champs strengths but... yeah continue on...

"being a tank-buster"
You mean in a 1v1 late game against a tank? An adc with bt or bork and lord dominks can do that too guess all carries need a rework god forbid anyone can 1v1 a tank...

"highly mobile"???
In lane with a ton of minions where dashing through them pushes the wave and puts him in a bad position in lane unless you push back?? Yea i guess you would see no drawbacks in that.

"having point and click crowd control that can affect multiple people"
which yasuo are you playing? I didnt know he had a point a click cc?? Is this new? maybe on the pbe??

"decent or greater wave-clear"
"greater" i mean he doesnt come anywhere near xerath lux syndra ziggs or anivia at wave clearing but i guess yea if you let a champion auto attack minions they should die...

"has synergy with any champion possessing a knockup or displacement"
thats an issue? because he works well with champions? Ori works well with malphite and shen is that an issue too? Does she need a rework for that? J4 as well pretty much any initiator 

"low cooldown abilities"
compared to what? on what his Q? his E? or his R? Lux cdr on ult can get to 20 seconds and lower she has a cc on a 4 sec cd thats okay but the melee guy that has to get in your face to Q cant be on 1.33 seconds? or his E where you cant redash through a target until a certain amount of time has passed i guess they need to change udyr's stun too then.

"HIGHER RANGE THAN TYPICAL MELEES"
Are you referring to his nado? thats up only a 3rd of the time if he's Q'ing constantly? Or just in general his skill shot Q distance? Either way i wouldnt call having a little bit of range on an ability on issue. 

"and did I miss something...I probably did but I lost track"

"they've gutted his stats from their release values and he's still a major threat in the game...that says something"
So you're using your opinion as support for your claim?
I dont find him a major threat at all.

oriana's ultimate is conditional, requiring the opponents to be in close proximity and for her team to have the perfect setup to work with it 

Yasuo's wind-wall is unconditional, unless we enter some odd meta where there are no ranged matchups for him to take advantage of ?  Oriana's ultimate also requires setup in advance and is not a strict advantage for her team.  Viktor can do the same thing on a regular ability, Malphite is often the setup for it but he does the same thing, and it's hard to remember wombo-combo champions off of the top of my head

Lux...when you start straw manning, it does not look good for your argument.  All 5 players would have to not move at all, be extremely low on hp,  or be walking in a straight line in warded territory

Yasuo walks to the front line and waits for ranged champions to attempt an engage or finisher, then tosses his windwall, or just tosses it at the start of a fight for his own ranged champions to take advantage of, hence, unconditional.  He has no requirements to use it EXCEPT that his team might benefit from it

Brand is powerful, but for that power comes a cost:  reliability .  His skillshots are slow, his crowd control is conditional and untargeted, his ultimate can even be snuffed out completely by moving out of range of allies or by the champion you are defending:  yasuo.  He has an advantage in death-ball fights, but those are rare and actively what the community is trying to prevent when riot starts making strange changes.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

okay, now that i've basically debunked those since all of your arguments are reliant upon the opponents making ridiculous mistakes or situations that require a ton of setup...

Yasuo does not get "poked out of lane" unless the yasuo is consistently misplaying(he also has the option of playing top lane).  He has a shield which negates all but the most powerful of initiations,  as many dashes as there are enemies nearby,  range that out-ranges other melee champions and makes him a consistent threat in mid lane for MOST mages when combined with his dashes.  I also said that it would be changed to an OFFENSIVE ability.  Yasuo scales like a beast.  He could use it to wave clear or even to reflect his opponents abilities like Fiora ripostes them...

you also call yasuo a melee marksman.  He has plenty of defenses including melee base stats to keep himself alive and his build-path is not the same as marksmen.  He only has to build 2 crit items and that's it, not 3 or 4 and offensive items with defensive traits scale heavily with his kit

FOUR DEFENSIVE ABILITIES:  hard crowd control, wind wall, E dashes,  passive shield (which he can refresh with his ultimate for two very powerful shields)

Every 20 seconds...how often do team fights happen and how long do they last now?  Also, baiting requires your OPPONENT to mess up, which you have no control over.  Does he also bait marksmen...for his entire team when they play around windwall ?

being a tank buster:  his utimate reduces bonus armor by 50%.  with {{item:3036}}  , he can reduce a 300 armor tank to about 130...

highly mobile:  his mobility may only have a range of 475 but in the chaos of team fights, this allows him to move from target to target.  Yasuo might push the wave, but if he is pushing the wave, are you going to let him farm?  If you are close enough to auto attack, he is close enough to attack you and should you miss with your ability, you are likely going to push back against the wave.  He also does not have to use it to push the wave, only to dodge your skillshots

point and click crowd control:  didn't you know that his Q can be used during sweeping strike, turning it into a targeted spin attack area of effect knockup ?  even if he chooses NOT to do that, he is then at point blank range to use his crowd control anyway

wave clear:  you just argued FOR YASUO'S WAVE CLEAR, now you are arguing AGAINST IT?!

knockup synergy:  it's an issue for yasuo because his power is based around his Q being the only source he has to engage with for his ultimate.  Suddenly, a large host of champions allow him to SUPPRESS his opponents while extending crowd control that they are under by a targeted, long range ability that can hit multiple opponents at once?

cooldowns:  yasuo's Q starts on a 4 second cooldown(and is reduced by attack speed, netting him one of the most efficient build paths in the game...), his E a 0.5 second cooldown(which is basically the length of the ability) and it only gets smaller the more points it has down to 0.1 second ;  his windwall which is more powerful than many ultimate abilities and just as useful as some of the most powerful ultimates in the game is only on a starting cooldown of 26 seconds ; his ULTIMATE gets as low as 30 seconds BEFORE COOLDOWN REDUCTION .  Lux's ultimate is at 50...  He gets TWO ULTIMATES IN HIS KIT AND BOTH ARE LOW COOLDOWN

higher attack range:  yasuo's attack range is the second highest of all melee champions, only trumped by Irelia and BOTH are able to kite using this small advantage during trades.  If you count his Q, which remember is only on a 4 second cooldown BEFORE ANY ATTACK SPEED ITEMS,  he has 475 range with hit and 900 range with the tornado, which for some reason counts as an auto attack until after the first champion hit and then the info is confusing

I did miss something as was pointed out by floo,  yasuo has NO RESOURCES AT ALL TO SPEND, SO HE CAN REMAIN IN LANE AS LONG AS HE CHOOSES

his base abilities have been reduced:  his shield used to last for 2 seconds instead of 1, used to be able to block up to 690 damage, his flow generation used to be what is currently his lategame flow generation, he was powerful enough upon release that they reduced him to a base health in the 400's, trying to curb his power by making him easier to punish (which has since been changed)

#YOU may not find him a major threat, but the vast majority of players including diamond and above DO FIND HIM A THREAT.  That is your personal opinion as you liked to say, whereas he is banned by 63% of diamond and above players, picked by 16.9% and even when he has a 48% win rate he still has these ridiculous numbers https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/yasuo/diamond

For your comment about straw manning i wasnt i was applying the same logic you were applying to his wind wall. You said all 5 players need to stand in a lane when lux just needs to snare 1 carry and pop them while hitting 2 or 3 other teammates and the teamfight is won.  Meanwhile apparently in yasuo's case you can move around and still not get passed the wind wall??? I mean its the same if you stand still and keep trying to auto yea the wind wall is going to block it change positioning and it wont. Plus a good wind wall isnt placed "by accident".

Yasuo walks to the front line and waits for ranged champions to attempt an engage or finisher
Most ranged champions wouldnt engage since you have an initiator for that but again in LOWER ELOS where people complain about yasuo this isnt the case because team comps are ass.

for the marksman comment, yea he needs defensive items otherwise he'd just get popped in teamfights for being melee. He cant stay out of range and just auto. I called him a melee marksman because he does his dmg in a similar manner but hes melee.

As for the brand comment brand actually averages more dmg than yasuo in mid lane so keep that in mind when responding to me about brand.

A passive shield which can be popped with an auto attack and just a walk away in teamfights the shield isnt that large of a factor if you're cc'ing him.

Yasuo doesnt get poked out of lane? For every ability a mage throws (who yasuo counters) theres another ability he cant block with his wind wall because it'll be on cd causing him to either miss out on cs or take dmg for the cs.

being a tank buster:  his utimate reduces bonus armor by 50%.  with {{item:3036}}  , he can reduce a 300 armor tank to about 130...
